archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0019
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a new or existing customer, I want to be able to purchase hardware outright online as a guest, so that I can make my purchase quickly and easily

properties.value: Purchasing in BSS is realized in context of an existing customer or with onboarding of a new customer. More details needed. A seperate session to be planned.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
